page.title: 14BUILDINGS AROUND CONDOVER
page.content: The private estate covers Harley Road, Harley Drive and part of Station Road. The latest addition to housing in the village is an estate of 22 old peoples bungalows and two luxury dwelling houses built in grounds previosly belonging to Condover Court.Condover Park is a private luxury housing estate which was started in 1969 and completed in 1976.Condover Court was built as an Elizabethen Cruck house known as the Small House which was the Dower house for Condover Hall.Condover Hall was built by Sir Thomas Owen and completed in 1598.The village hall stands in the centre of the village and was converted into it's present form from exsisting buildings on the same site.
